Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 87th overall pick, by Montreal in 2016...
Injured on 8/17/2016 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/24/2017 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/27/2018 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Drafted in Rule 5 Draft, 2nd round, by Houston in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Billy Landwehr (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2019, off Lawrence Barber (KC)...
Traded from Houston to Montreal on 3/2/2020 (Going to HOU: 3B Kuemon Takamasa. Going to MON: CF Francisco Chavez)...
Injured on 7/15/2020 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for full season...
Released by Montreal on 5/26/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 3/1/2022 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/7/2022 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 9/4/2022 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 3/1/2023 to a minor league contract.
